title: Lol client not responding after i accept match Queue
body:
Hi all,

Lately, whenever i queue for ranked games, my client crashes once i accept the match queue, i've waited for it to respond but it is stuck on the white screen. When i force it to close down, i log back in and I get penalized (it is not 1 hour wait time). This is fucking bullshit as I did not purposely dodge champ select. 

Also, whenever i finish a match, there would be a maestro error. These problems doesnt happen to my other computer and I have installed and uninstalled and also tried repairing the client and non of it works.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Still experiencing this issue?

Are you launching the client through the patcher?

Have you tried launching the game as Administrator?

Hey,

i am still experiencing this issue, but i also have other issues in my life which further affects this issue (one being a centrelink bum and unskilled noobs in this game).

anyways, i dont know whats happening. help plz
